about.title: About
about.subtitle: Who we are and what we‚Äôre building
about.missionBody: We aim to make world-class UI primitives accessible to every builder. BroWorld gathers community contributions, curated patterns, and inclusive guidelines so teams can ship faster together.

builders.title: Empower every builder
builders.body: Deliver opinionated defaults and accessible patterns for teams of any size.

community.title: Grow with community
community.body: Elevate contributions from maintainers across regions and celebrate open collaboration.

iteration.title: Iterate responsibly
iteration.body: Ship carefully tested releases with transparent roadmaps and measurable impact.

about.valuesSubtitle: The guardrails that shape every release and partnership.
about.valuesMediaPlaceholder: Reserved hero image or product preview. Replace with final asset before launch.

community.title: Co-created with the community
community.body: Moderated working groups share their challenges so we can design intentionally inclusive solutions.

design.title: Design systems aware
design.body: Every component aligns with accessibility tokens, responsive breakpoints, and motion guidelines.

velocity.title: Momentum from automation
velocity.body: Starter templates and CLI tooling keep updates shipping without losing quality.

quality.title: Quality and trust by default
quality.body: Rigorous reviews, visual regression suites, and observability keep experiences resilient.

about.metricsSubtitle: Signals from the builders and communities who rely on BroWorld today.

contributors.label: Active contributors
contributors.caption: Designers, engineers, and storytellers submitting improvements every quarter.

components.label: Composable primitives
components.caption: Reusable Vue components, composables, and starter flows ready for production.

locales.label: Supported locales
locales.caption: Localized experiences with right-to-left and accessibility coverage.

satisfaction.label: Satisfaction score
satisfaction.caption: Maintainers reporting that BroWorld increases delivery speed and clarity.

about.teamBody: BroWorld is maintained by a distributed group of designers, engineers, and storytellers who believe that open tooling should feel delightful.

amina.bio: Shapes the product vision and keeps the roadmap grounded in community needs.

lukas.bio: Guides the architecture and ensures every release is performant, accessible, and well tested.

clara.bio: Translates feedback into actionable docs and helps contributors feel welcome.

youssef.bio: Hosts community sessions, curates contributions, and makes sure conversations stay inclusive.

about.techBody: We lean on a modern Vue stack to keep documentation and production surfaces in sync.

techStack.nuxt: Hybrid-rendered experiences powered by file-based routing.
techStack.vuetify: Accessible design system primitives with first-class RTL support.
techStack.typescript: Type-safe authoring across components, stores, and utilities.
techStack.vitest: Fast unit and component testing for reliable releases.

2025.description: Introduced shared templates, integrated feedback loops, and improved automation.

community.title: Community presence
community.description: Welcome members, broadcast announcements, and host social spaces.

lobby.name: Interactive lobby
lobby.description: Guide newcomers with custom zones, featured posts, and smart onboarding.
points: Build modular landing rooms with drag-and-drop widgets.
Highlight trending events, moderators, and creator spotlights.
Schedule dynamic greetings that adapt to time zones.

events.name: Event orchestration
events.description: Plan tournaments, premieres, and collaborative quests with automated reminders.
points: Coordinate multi-stage brackets and RSVPs in one dashboard.
Sync calendars, ticketing, and broadcast overlays automatically.
Unlock post-event recaps with stats, clips, and rewards.

streams.name: Creator streams
streams.description: Embed live streams, watch parties, and backstage chats without leaving your world.
points: Support multi-platform streaming with adaptive quality.
Unlock co-streaming rooms for community commentators.
Capture highlights and publish recap reels instantly.

economy.title: Economy & progression
economy.description: Design progression loops, trading systems, and reward paths tailored to your world.

market.name: Marketplace hub
market.description: Launch safe trading for cosmetics, crafting materials, and time-limited drops.
points: List items with rarity, seasonality, and bundle options.
Protect transactions with escrow, tax, and fraud tooling.
Publish merchandising campaigns with dynamic pricing rules.

crafting.name: Crafting simulator
crafting.description: Author recipes, resource nodes, and crafting stations with live balancing.
points: Define ingredient trees and skill requirements visually.
Simulate yield, cooldowns, and fail states before release.
Link crafting outputs to quests, vendors, or marketplace listings.

rewards.name: Rewards engine
rewards.description: Reward cohorts with quests, achievements, and season passes.
points: Segment milestones by player type, region, or platform.
Automate reward delivery with fraud-safe claims.
Track redemption analytics and churn risk in real time.

governance.title: Governance & safety
governance.description: Empower trusted teams with moderation, safety, and insight workflows.

moderation.name: Moderation console
moderation.description: Resolve reports, escalations, and appeals with collaborative tooling.
points: Route cases automatically by severity and language.
Surface evidence timelines with chat, clips, and audit logs.
Assign playbooks, sanctions, and cooldown windows in context.

safety.name: Safety automation
safety.description: Detect toxicity, spam, and suspicious behaviour before it spreads.
points: Deploy ML classifiers tuned for your community norms.
Set up adaptive rate limits and content filters.
Notify guardians and caretakers with role-based alerts.

analytics.name: Governance analytics
analytics.description: Measure health, retention, and policy impact across every world surface.
points: Monitor safety KPIs with real-time dashboards.
Correlate moderation actions with engagement outcomes.
Export compliance-ready reports for stakeholders.

job.title: Jobs
job.subtitle: Centralise every step of your recruiting funnel to move from sourcing to signing with clarity.

matching.title: Spot the right talent faster
matching.description: Aggregate sourcing activity and prioritise applicants automatically.
points: Sync job boards, referrals, and internal mobility into one view.
Score applications with configurable criteria and bias safeguards.
Highlight talent pools ready for nurture or re-engagement.

automation.title: Automate team coordination
automation.description: Give recruiters, interviewers, and hiring managers a shared command centre.
points: Trigger interview kits and reminders in the right timezone.
Share structured feedback templates that surface signal over noise.
Notify stakeholders the moment a candidate advances or stalls.

insights.title: Measure hiring impact
insights.description: Understand conversion, velocity, and quality without exporting spreadsheets.
points: Track time-to-fill, diversity ratios, and offer acceptance in real time.
Visualise bottlenecks across regions or job families instantly.
Share live dashboards with leadership and partners securely.

publish.title: Publish with confidence

review.title: Review together

performance.title: Experience quality snapshot
performance.subtitle: A focused look at how the home feed performs on real devices.

metrics.title: Core experience metrics
metrics.subtitle: Based on mobile Lighthouse runs (emulated Moto G Power).

fcp.label: First Contentful Paint
fcp.description: The first meaningful pixels paint in under a second.

lcp.label: Largest Contentful Paint
lcp.description: Hero media loads after the skeleton but still within Core Web Vitals.
lcp.trend: Optimise by preloading the featured image sprite.

tbt.label: Total Blocking Time
tbt.description: Long tasks during hydration keep the thread busy.
tbt.trend: Caused by eager loading of optional widgets.

speedIndex.label: Speed Index
speedIndex.description: Visual completeness is acceptable but can be improved.
speedIndex.trend: Greatly benefits from prioritised CSS delivery.

cls.label: Cumulative Layout Shift
cls.description: Cards and story rail shift as late content arrives.
cls.trend: Anchor media with fixed aspect ratios to stabilise the feed.

opportunities.title: High-impact opportunities
opportunities.subtitle: Prioritised fixes that address the red metrics first.

layout.title: Stabilise media and widget slots
layout.description: Reserve space for hero banners, carousels, and dynamic ads.
layout.action: Adopt intrinsic aspect ratios and skeleton heights for feed items.

script.title: Defer non-critical scripts
script.description: Split analytics, reactions, and messaging panels out of the main chunk.
script.action: Hydrate optional widgets on interaction using `defineAsyncComponent`.

assets.title: Optimise hero imagery
assets.description: Compress the hero collage and serve AVIF sources by default.
assets.action: Preload the first feed image and stream others via lazy loading.

monitoring.title: Expand Core Web Vitals coverage
monitoring.description: Break metrics down per route and device bucket.
monitoring.action: Ship `web-vitals` beacons to the analytics lake for regression tracking.

timeline.title: Improvement timeline
timeline.subtitle: A realistic rollout to ship and verify the fixes.

week1.title: Eliminate layout shift
week1.description: Audit all feed cards and stories for deterministic sizing.
actions: Add aspect ratios to story thumbnails and post illustrations.
Lock advertisement containers behind placeholder skeletons.

week2.title: Break up long tasks
week2.description: Move optional logic into idle callbacks and async boundaries.
actions: Code-split the messenger drawer and reaction tray.

week3.title: Verify gains with RUM
week3.description: Roll out Core Web Vitals reporting to production cohorts.
actions: Send vitals to the monitoring lake with build metadata.
Alert on LCP/TBT regressions above 10% week-over-week.

help.title: Help
help.subtitle: Find answers and resources
help.faqEmpty: No FAQ entries match your search yet. Try a different keyword.

actions.reportBugDescription: Share reproducible steps so we can investigate quickly.
actions.reportBugAria: Create a new GitHub issue in a new tab
actions.accountPrivacyDescription: Reset your credentials or request account changes from the dashboard.
actions.accountPrivacyAria: Go to the account recovery page
actions.contactSupportDescription: Reach our maintainers directly when you need a human touch.

gettingStarted.question: How do I start using BroWorld components?
gettingStarted.answer: Install the package, run the setup script, and explore the Starter templates to see best practices in action.

localization.question: Which languages are supported?
localization.answer: English, French, Arabic, German, and more translations are maintained by our community partners.

components.question: Where can I find live component examples?
components.answer: Browse the component directory to view interactive demos and copy-ready code snippets.

contributing.question: How can I contribute?
contributing.answer: Review the contribution guidelines, open an issue with your idea, and submit a pull request when you are ready.

privacy.question: How do you handle privacy requests?
